resources.string: AHelene tattoos and much bare skin: Sophia Tomalla and her year 2018
Sophia Tomalla: Tears and alcohol at the beginning of the year

The year started with many tears for Sophia Thomalla . The reason? The German national handball team was eliminated in the European Championship semi-final. Goalkeeper Silvio Heinevetter has been dating since 2009 with her mother Simone Thomalla. No wonder then that Sophia reaches for alcohol in despair ...
